00044 void BaseApplLayer::sendDelayedDown(cMessage *msg, simtime_t delay) {
00045     recordPacket(PassedMessage::OUTGOING, PassedMessage::LOWER_DATA, msg);
00046     sendDelayed(msg, delay, lowerGateOut);
00047 }
